sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar flat>
    <v-container class="d-flex justify-space-between align-center">
      <!-- Logo e Título -->
      <v-title depressed class="title">REPOSITÓRIO ACADÊMICO</v-title>
      <v-img src="/aplicacao/frontend/public/img/logo.png"></v-img>
      
      <v-divider vertical class="mx-3"></v-divider>
      <v-title depressed class="title-adm">Sou administrador:</v-title>
      
      <!-- Botão Entrar -->
      <v-btn @click="login" class="login-btn">ENTRAR</v-btn>

    </v-container>
  </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  methods: {
    login() {
      // Ação de login
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-app-bar {
  background: #005f00;
  padding: 10px 0;
}

.title {
  background-color: #00420c;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #fff;
}

.title-adm {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #fff;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.v-divider {
  background-color: #fff;
  height: 60px;
}

.login-btn {
  background-color: #00420c;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 7px;
  width: 120px;
  height: 45px;
}
</style>
